home.titleSubText: Sono un appassionato laureato in ingegneria disposto a imparare e padroneggiare nuove tecnologie, con una passione speciale per il DevOps.

about.title: Qualcosa su di me
about.desc: As a recent graduate from Universit√† di Parma with a Laurea in Ingegneria Informatica, Elettronica e Telecomunicazioni, I am eager to start my career in the technology industry. Through various academic projects, I have honed my skills and developed a keen eye for detail and a deep understanding of software development methodologies. I am a team player who values open communication and collaboration, and I am eager to quickly adapt to new challenges and make meaningful contributions to a team. I am excited to learn and work with cutting-edge technologies and help drive innovation and progress in the field.

skills.title: Skills
skills.desc: From my academic background and practical experience, I have developed a wide range of technical and soft skills that I am eager to bring to a new role.
skills.subtitle: Languages
skills.langDesc: These are the languages that I have acquired the most expertise in, and I am confident in my ability to use them effectively in a professional setting.
skills.frameworkDesc: With a solid background in my studies, I have gained proficiency in various frameworks and technologies. This expertise, combined with my problem-solving skills and attention to detail, allows me to confidently use them in a professional setting to deliver successful results.
